text: Sir Alan Towers Traill (5 July 193517 April 2020)King Edward's Witley: Alan Towers Traill (1936-2020) was a British politician who served as Lord Mayor of London from 1984 to 1985. In the 1990 New Zealand Queen's Birthday Honours, Traill was apopinted a Companion of the Queen's Service Order for public services. Traill died on 17 April 2020 at the age of 84. He was survived by his wife, Sarah (), and son, Phillip. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:20th-century lord mayors of London Category:Knights Grand Cross of the Order of the British Empire Category:Companions of the Queen's Service Order
title: Alan Traill
